card1.header: Chat with your Customers around the world
card1.subtitle: BoticAI is the natural language processing engine with extreme adaptability for new languages

card2.subtitle: Power your bot with phrases & metonyms from our priority sectors.

card3.subtitle: For a client with 90,000 customer support requests per day, SiniticAI™ exhibits up to 11% higher Chinese accuracy than a brand-name NLP engine.

card4.subtitle: Our engineers are at forefront of natural language processing research.

processDetailsWidget.heading: Automation isn’t magic. Here’s how it works

leftCard.heading: Input
leftCard.content: Use chat history to build chatbot dialogue and conduct initial BoticAI training.

rightCard.heading: Prediction
rightCard.content: BoticAI predicts the correct human intent from multilingual support requests.

leftCard.heading: Judgement
leftCard.content: Our NLP experts set the confidence threshold for intent detection, based on a top-k heuristic.

rightCard.heading: Action
rightCard.content: Your chatbot sends correct replies to humans, or passes the conversation to an agent

leftCard.heading: Outcome
leftCard.content: Substantial customer support automation and increased customer satisfaction

rightCard.heading: Training
rightCard.content: BoticAI increases automation by re-training on live chat history.
